description: This file defines data models (Ingredient, Recipe, PaginatedRecipes) and an API client (ApiClient) for interacting with a backend API in a Flutter app. It handles HTTP requests to fetch recipes, individual recipe details, and health status.

classes.name: Ingredient
classes.description: Model representing an ingredient with name and optional quantity.

classes.name: Recipe
classes.description: Model representing a recipe with various attributes such as id, title, description, ingredients, steps, etc.

classes.name: PaginatedRecipes
classes.description: Model for paginated list of recipes, including total count, page info, and items.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: HTTP client wrapper for interacting with the backend API, with methods to list recipes, get a specific recipe, and check server health.

methods.name: Ingredient.fromJson
methods.description: Creates an Ingredient instance from JSON data.

methods.name: Recipe.fromJson
methods.description: Creates a Recipe instance from JSON data.

methods.name: PaginatedRecipes.fromJson
methods.description: Creates a PaginatedRecipes instance from JSON data.

methods.name: ApiClient.listRecipes
methods.description: Fetches a paginated list of recipes from the backend API.

methods.name: ApiClient.getRecipe
methods.description: Fetches details of a single recipe by ID.

methods.name: ApiClient.health
methods.description: Checks the health status of the backend server.
